oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pescarol, Moshe ben Avraham
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bible. O.T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Illuminated scroll, earliest known example of an Italian illustrated Magillah. This section shows three panels, the first shows a Queen and a man in a Turban kneeling, with two other men standing over them. The second panel shows two soldiers on the left and a man hanging on a gibbett on the right of the illustration. The third panel shows shows a group of people hanging from gallows.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Detail of Esther scroll
